sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"怀疑"之意。
means: doubt ： 普通用词，多指因证据不足或仅凭证据还不能肯定而产生怀疑，多含否定意味。
suspect ： 指猜疑、疑心，肯定意味较多。
distrust ： 指疑惑、猜疑，不信任。

sentence.Network_en: Investigators say nearly $100,000 was wired into the suspect's bank accounts.
sentence.Network_cn: 调查人员说有近10万美元汇入了嫌疑人的银行账户。

sentence.Network_en: Do women really share such stupid jokes? We suspect not.
sentence.Network_cn: 女人们真的会觉得如此愚蠢的笑话好笑吗？我们想不会。

sentence.Network_en: I suspect he isn't altogether unhappy about my absence.
sentence.Network_cn: 我猜想他对我的缺席并没有感到很不高兴。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... susceptive 有接受力的；敏感的 suspect 怀疑 suspend 悬挂，中止.
新编大学英语单词表(第三册) - 豆丁网 ... shortage n. 缺少，缺乏，不足 suspect n. 嫌疑犯 unsettle v. 使不安.
考博英语词汇 ... susceptible a. 易受感动的；敏感的；易感的 suspect n. 嫌疑犯 v．怀疑；猜想 suspend v. 悬挂；推迟；暂停.
高中英语新课程标准词汇表 ... surrounding a. 周围的 suspect n. 犯罪嫌疑人 swallow vt. 吞下； 咽下.

list.abs: 海运常用英文词汇缩写 - 天狼2008 ... 不清洁提单 foul bill 有疑问提单 suspected bill 货物 goods | | freight | | cargo.
who exactly did you suspect to be an accomplice ., 你怀疑谁会是同伙呢.
灵蛙翻译 - linguafrog - 网易博客 ... 病例 case 疑似病例 suspected case 爆发 outbreak.
142 I see. 我知道了！143 I suspect. 我怀疑。144 I won't！ 我绝不！
Intelligent as you are , I suspect you will fail ., 尽管你聪明 , 我猜想你会失败.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (originally as an adjective): from Latin suspectus 'mistrusted', past participle of suspicere, from sub- 'from below' + specere 'to look'

entry.def: You use suspect when you are stating something that you believe is probably true, in order to make it sound less strong or direct.

example.ex: The above complaints are, I suspect, just the tip of the iceberg...
example.tran: 我想，以上的抱怨只是冰山一角。

entry.def: If you suspect that something dishonest or unpleasant has been done, you believe that it has probably been done. If you suspect someone of doing an action of this kind, you believe that they probably did it.

example.ex: He suspected that the woman staying in the flat above was using heroin...
example.tran: 他怀疑楼上公寓里的那个女人正在吸食海洛因。

example.ex: Police said they suspected that Sobhraj had accomplices who are drug smugglers...
example.tran: 警方说他们怀疑索布拉还有一些走私毒品的同伙。

entry.def: A suspect is a person who the police or authorities think may be guilty of a crime.

example.ex: Police have arrested a suspect in a series of killings and sexual assaults in the city.
example.tran: 警察已经逮捕了一名涉嫌在该市犯下一系列杀人及强奸案的嫌疑犯。

entry.tran: 不可靠的;不可信的;可能有假的;可疑的
entry.def: Suspect things or people are ones that you think may be dangerous or may be less good or genuine than they appear.

example.ex: Delegates evacuated the building when a suspect package was found...
example.tran: 发现可疑包裹后，代表们撤离了这座楼。

example.ex: The firm has taken out adverts in national newspapers to urge customers to return suspect products...
example.tran: 该公司在全国性的报纸上登出广告，催促顾客退回疑似假冒产品。

means.word_mean: 2. a person or institution against whom an action is brought in a court of law; the person being sued or accused
1. imagine to be the case or true or probable;

sentences.sentence: "I surmised that the butler did it"

means.word_mean: 2. regard as untrustworthy; regard with suspicion; have no faith or confidence in
3. hold in suspicion; believe to be guilty;

sentences.sentence: "The U.S. suspected Bin Laden as the mastermind behind the terrorist attacks"
"there was something fishy about the accident"

auth_sentence.content: In any case, the statement seems rather suspect.
auth_sentence.res_content: In any case, the statement seems rather suspect.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In any case, the statement seems rather suspect.

auth_sentence.content: I suspect that it involves the use of algorithms.
auth_sentence.res_content: I suspect that it involves the use of algorithms.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I suspect that it involves the use of algorithms.

auth_sentence.content: We suspect it is an example of self-serving bias.
auth_sentence.res_content: We suspect it is an example of self-serving bias.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We suspect it is an example of self-serving bias.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 易受感染的,易受影响的
stems_affixes.word_buile: sus在……下面+cept拿+ible可..的→能被拿下→易受影响
sus在……下面+cept拿+ive……的→有拿下的能力→有接受力的
sus在……下面+ten支撑+ance表名词→支撑下去的东西→粮食;坚持
sus在……下面+spect看→在下面看一看→suspect怀疑
sus在……下面+pend挂→挂在下面→悬挂
sus在……下面+pens挂+e→一颗心挂着
sus在……下面+spir呼吸+e→喝望
sus在……下面+tain握住→在下面握住→支撑
circum周围+spect看→看周围→小心
per全部+spect看+ive……的→看透了的→透视的
prospect前景+ive……的→adj.预期的
respect尊敬+able可以……的→adj.可敬的;人格高尚的
respect尊敬,尊重+ful有……的→adj.恭敬的,尊重的
re回+spect看+ive……的→回头看[自己]→各自的
retrospect[v.回顾,回想]+ive……的→adj.追想的,回顾的
spect看+acular……的→adj.壮观的,引人注目的 n.壮观的演出
respective[adj.各自的,各个的]+ly表副词→adv.分别地, 各个地
pro前面+spect看→向前看→前景

stems_affixes.value_cn: 样子, 外表, 面貌, [问题等的]方面
stems_affixes.word_buile: a加强意义+spect看→看的东西→外表,容貌
circumspect[adj.小心谨慎的]+ion表名词→n.细心,慎重
inspect[v.检查,调查,视察]+or人→n.检查员, 巡视员
inspect[v.检查,调查,视察]+ion表名词→n.检查,审查;检阅

stems_affixes.value_cn: 章程,内容简介;创办计划
stems_affixes.word_buile: pro前+spect看+us→向前看的东西
re再+spect看→再看[一眼]→尊敬
spect看+acle东西→看的东西→景象;眼镜
spect看+acular……的→adj.壮观的,引人注目的 n.壮观的演出
spect看+ator人→看的人
spect看+rum→可以看的范围
re再+spect看→再看[一眼]→尊敬
ex出+pect=spect看→看出去,看外面→期待
in内,里面+spect看→看里面→检查
retro向后+spect看→向后看
spec=spect看+ulate→看准了→思考,投机
sus下面+spect看→在下面看一看,斜眼看→怀疑

Sentence.sentence: I suspect the reason is a deep-rooted love of the fire.
I suspect that whatever Facebook has done so far to invade our privacy, it's only the beginning.
A search is now under way to confirm the suspected existence of particles of matter that move at a speed greater than light, and therefore, might serve as our passports to the past.
For instance, witnesses sometimes see photographs of several suspects before they try to identify the person they saw in a lineup of people.
What is Sanjay Kumar suspected of?
He is suspected of having slipped something in Kumar's bag

means.word_mean: 猜疑(是), 怀疑(是), 觉得(是)

sentences.en: I suspect (that) you once thought otherwise.
sentences.cn: 我觉得你一度有过不同的想法。

sentences.en: I suspect him to know everything about that.
sentences.cn: 我猜想那件事他全都知道了。

sentences.en: We all suspect the truth of the report.
sentences.cn: 我们对报告的真实性感到怀疑。

sentences.en: The police suspect him of having taken the money.
They suspect him to be a thief.

means.word_mean: 嫌疑犯; 嫌疑分子; 可疑对象

sentences.en: Two suspects are now being interrogated in connection with the killing.
sentences.cn: 与杀人案有关的两名嫌疑犯正在接受审讯。

means.word_mean: 可疑的, 可能有危险的, 有违法嫌疑的

sentences.en: His reason for being absent is suspect.
sentences.cn: 他缺席的理由不足为信。

jushi.english: He that once deceives is ever suspected.
Why didn't she suspect the cheat?
jushi.chinese: 她为什么不怀疑那骗子?
